message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'm willing to take a risk and give you a small share, but I'm not going to give up too much!
I'm not willing to take a risk with such a small share. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm looking for a fair split, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I can get a better deal. Let's try again!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not getting any younger. I want a better deal than that!
I'm not backing down. I think I deserve a bigger share, considering the value of the money is dropping fast!
I'm getting close to giving up, but I'm not going to let you get all the remaining value. Let's make a last attempt!
You're trying to squeeze the last bit of value out of me, but I'm not going to let you get away with it. I want more!
This is my last offer. I'm taking what's left, and you're getting the scraps. Don't expect any more concessions!
